data.title: Clerks (Blu-ray, 1994)
data.meta_description:
Get ready to laugh with Clerks on Blu-ray! This 1994 comedy, directed by Kevin Smith, follows the life of a convenience store clerk and his friend as they navigate their daily routine. Starring Ernest O'Donnell, Brian O'Halloran, and Donna Jeanne, this MA15+ rated film is a must-see for any comedy lover.


This Blu-ray edition features a 1.85:1 aspect ratio and a run time of 88 minutes. With English language and subtitles, this format is perfect for those who want to enjoy the film in high definition. Don't miss out on this classic piece of cinema history.
